channel.title: CVE Feed for FlyCASS -- Cockpit Access Security System (CASS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FlyCASS -- Cockpit Access Security System (CASS)

item.title: CVE-2024-8395|2024-09-05T20:28:18.500Z -- flycass -- cockpit%20access%20security%20system%20%28cass%29
item.description: FlyCASS CASS and KCM systems did not correctly filter SQL queries, which made them vulnerable to attack by outside attackers with no authentication.
